title: Chisholm Trail Historical Museum
text:
The Chisholm Trail Historical Museum was a <a href="museum">museum</a> in <a href="Waurika%2C%20Oklahoma">Waurika, Oklahoma</a> which celebrated the historic <a href="Chisolm%20Trail">Chisolm Trail</a>. It covered the history of the <a href="Chisholm%20Trail">Chisholm Trail</a> and the people associated with it. Operation of the museum at one point was given to the Oklahoma Historical Society. The museum has since closed.
There are other museums dedicated to the Chisholm Trail, such as the <a href="Chisholm%20Trail%20Museum%20%28Kingfisher%2C%20Oklahoma%29">Chisholm Trail Museum</a> in <a href="Kingfisher%2C%20Oklahoma">Kingfisher, Oklahoma</a>, the <a href="Chisholm%20Trail%20Heritage%20Center">Chisholm Trail Heritage Center</a> in <a href="Duncan%2C%20Oklahoma">Duncan, Oklahoma</a>, the <a href="Chisholm%20Trail%20Museum%20%28Wellington%2C%20Kansas%29">Chisholm Trail Museum</a> in <a href="Wellington%2C%20Kansas">Wellington, Kansas</a>, and other facilities in <a href="Cleburne%2C%20Texas">Cleburne, Texas</a> and <a href="Cuero%2C%20Texas">Cuero, Texas</a>.
